TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit SignatureHelper extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices._SignatureHelper

summary.span: 提供生成签名的方法。

span.span: Provides methods for building signatures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类来创建签名 blob，可传递给方法类。Use the class to create a signature blob that can be passed to the method of the class. A还可以将对象传递给方法重载将 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 流中插入一个指令和签名的令牌。A object can also be passed to the method overload to insert an instruction and a signature token into a Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) stream. 有关签名 blob 和元数据签名的信息，请参阅 ECMA Partition II 元数据文档。For information on signature blobs and signature metadata, see the ECMA Partition II Metadata documentation. > [!NOTE] > 联机; 我们提供了 ECMA 第 ii 部分文档请参阅[ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)MSDN 上和[标准 ecma-335-公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) Ecma International 网站上。The ECMA Partition II documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

summary.span: 为签名添加参数。

span.span: Adds an argument to the signature.

span.span: Adds an argument to the signature.

span.span: The signature has already been finished.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自变量添加到签名中的元素的顺序的末尾`arguments`。The arguments are added to the end of the signature, in order of the elements of `arguments`. 请参阅表示自定义修饰符的类的命名空间。See the namespace for classes that represent custom modifiers.

summary.span: 创建并返回此实例的哈希代码。

span.span: Creates and returns a hash code for this instance.

span.span: Returns the hash code based on the name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实例的名称从创建哈希代码，因此返回的值相同就像`GetHashCode`方法调用的值`Name`属性。The hash code is created from the name of this instance, so the return value is the same as if the `GetHashCode` method were called on the value of the `Name` property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载使用标准调用约定创建的签名。This overload creates a signature with a standard calling convention. 若要创建具有自定义修饰符的方法签名，请使用方法重载，然后使用或方法重载添加具有自定义修饰符的自变量。To create a method signature with custom modifiers, use the method overload and then use the or method overloads to add arguments with custom modifiers.

Public Function GetSignature () As Byte()
public: cli::array <System::Byte> ^ GetSignature();

summary.span: 在签名中添加结束令牌并将签名标记为已完成，以确保不能再添加更多的令牌。

span.span: Adds the end token to the signature and marks the signature as finished, so no further tokens can be added.

returns.span: 返回由完整签名组成的字节数组。

span.span: Returns a byte array made up of the full signature.

.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Runtime.InteropServices._SignatureHelper.GetIDsOfNames([in]valuetype System.Guid& riid, native int rgszNames, unsigned int32 cNames, unsigned int32 lcid, native int rgDispId) cil managed
Sub GetIDsOfNames (ByRef riid As Guid, rgszNames As IntPtr, cNames As UInteger, lcid As UInteger, rgDispId As IntPtr) Implements _SignatureHelper.GetIDsOfNames

virtual void System.Runtime.InteropServices._SignatureHelper.GetIDsOfNames(Guid % riid, IntPtr rgszNames, System::UInt32 cNames, System::UInt32 lcid, IntPtr rgDispId) = System::Runtime::InteropServices::_SignatureHelper::GetIDsOfNames;

param.name: riid
param.span: 留待将来使用。

span.span: Reserved for future use.

param.span: 必须为 IID_NULL。

span.span: Must be IID_NULL.

param.name: rgszNames

span.span: Passed-in array of names to be mapped.

span.span: Count of the names to be mapped.

param.name: lcid

param.name: rgDispId

span.span: Caller-allocated array which receives the IDs corresponding to the names.

summary.span: 将一组名称映射为对应的一组调度标识符。

span.span: Maps a set of names to a corresponding set of dispatch identifiers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 有关详细信息`IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`，请参阅 MSDN 库。For more information about `IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`, see the MSDN Library.

param.span: 留待将来使用。
